column4: hey guys im having trouble with my screen i keep getting "OUT OF RANGE" error after I installed, and when I goto recovery mode I dont get a command line all I see is "==============" after various things load ;/
i cant use commands because i cant get to a terminal
im not talking about the computer im on, i installed Ubuntu on another computer, and it wont load the desktop
well when you boot in Recovery Mode what happens?
fsck?
any messages?
well any messages?
ok, but you get no prompt?
ok what happens before the string you showed me?
try switching to tty2 via Ctrl-Alt-F2?
yes
you have to wait a bit
until Ubuntu finishes loading, since getty for tty1-9 hasn't started
eventually you should get a login prompt
whats the line right before it?
looks like...a kernel panic?
when the kernel encounters an unrecoverable exception and dumps stack
run memtest86+
you might have bad memory
I had issues like this on a machine, that's what the cause was
there should be memtest on the Ubuntu CD
let it run for a while
if it finds any errors, then memory is most definitely the culprit
